entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Wasagaming
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 a.m. CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 10 cm except 20 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023
